Name: Competitor/competition relationship
Description: This is a compound-value type that holds information about competitors and the competitions in which they compete in multi-event sporting tournaments.

Properties.Name: Competition
Properties.Description: The competition this person or team competed in. This is the specific competition at a specific tournament, e.g. Men's Welterweight Boxing at the 1999 Pan American Games.

Properties.Name: Competitors
Properties.Description: An individual (or in the case of teams, individuals) who competed in this competition.

Properties.Name: Country
Properties.Description: The country (if any) this competitor or team was competing for. Leave blank if competitors in this tournament compete as individuals, rather than as representatives of a country.

Properties.Name: Medal
Properties.Description: If this competitor won a medal. Otherwise, blank.

Properties.Name: Rank
Properties.Description: The overall placing of this competitor in this event. Medalists should also be entered as 1, 2, or 3.

Properties.Name: Team
Properties.Description: For team competitions. This will frequently be used for national teams, such as the French Women's National Volleyball Team.
